Articles.Content:
I noticed that almost all of the intakes in the update had their amount increased to 2.0
I thought intake values were "Normals"? (a decimal indication of percentage)
how does the new system function, and can one large intake provide enough air for a two or more smaller engines?

Xyphos,
We have some good info here:
[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/139019-1-05-Intakes-Lets-figure-them-out[/url]

See ya there!
-Slashy
alright thanks, hopefully we can get some useful info.
